Content: An eye-clinic for benefit of Ingiriya civilians was conducted by the 582 Brigade troops on Sunday (11) on the directions of Major General Sathyapriya Liyanage, Commander, Security Forces - West and under the supervision of 582 Brigade Commander. It took place at Ingiriya Divisional Secretariat. More than 150 civilians attended it for treatment. The Elvitigala Lions Club in cooperation with the Army launched it. 582 Brigade Commander, Brigadier S.M.S.P.B Samarakoon arranged all requirements with his Brigade troops.
